65 std::string Cluster::GetNMEA()
66 {
67  std::stringstream hull_nmea;
68  //hull_nmea << nmea_msg_header << "," << in_ros_header.stamp.sec << "." <<
69  hull_nmea << this->GetNMEAHeader() << "," << this->GetROSHeader().stamp.sec << "." <<
70  this->GetROSHeader().stamp.nsec << "," << this->GetID();
71  for(auto p : this->GetPolygon().polygon.points)
72  {
73  hull_nmea << "," << p.x << "," << p.y;
74  }
75  hull_nmea << "*00\n";
76 
77  return hull_nmea.str();
78 }

100 
101 void Cluster::SetCloud(const pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr in_origin_cloud_ptr,
102  const std::vector<int>& in_cluster_indices, std_msgs::Header in_ros_header,
103  int in_id, std::string in_label, std::string in_nmea_header, int in_last_seen)
104 {
105  label_ = in_label;
106  id_ = in_id;
107  nmea_header_ = in_nmea_header;
108  ros_header_ = in_ros_header;
109  last_seen_ = in_last_seen;
110 
111  // extract point cloud using the indices
112  // calculate min and max points
113  pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr current_cluster(new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>);
114  float min_x = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
115  float max_x = -std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
116  float min_y = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
117  float max_y = -std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
118  float min_z = std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
119  float max_z = -std::numeric_limits<float>::max();
120  float average_x = 0, average_y = 0, average_z = 0;
121 
122  for (auto pit = in_cluster_indices.begin(); pit != in_cluster_indices.end(); ++pit)
123  {
124  // fill cluster point by point
125  pcl::PointXYZI p;
126  p.x = in_origin_cloud_ptr->points[*pit].x;
127  p.y = in_origin_cloud_ptr->points[*pit].y;
128  p.z = in_origin_cloud_ptr->points[*pit].z;
129  //p.i = in_origin_cloud_ptr->points[*pit].i;
130 
131  average_x += p.x;
132  average_y += p.y;
133  average_z += p.z;
134  centroid_.x += p.x;
135  centroid_.y += p.y;
136  centroid_.z += p.z;
137  current_cluster->points.push_back(p);
138 
139  if (p.x < min_x)
140  min_x = p.x;
141  if (p.y < min_y)
142  min_y = p.y;
143  if (p.z < min_z)
144  min_z = p.z;
145  if (p.x > max_x)
146  max_x = p.x;
147  if (p.y > max_y)
148  max_y = p.y;
149  if (p.z > max_z)
150  max_z = p.z;
151  }
152 
153  // min, max points
154  min_point_.x = min_x;
155  min_point_.y = min_y;
156  min_point_.z = min_z;
157  max_point_.x = max_x;
158  max_point_.y = max_y;
159  max_point_.z = max_z;
160 
161  // calculate centroid, average
162  if (in_cluster_indices.size() > 0)
163  {
164  centroid_.x /= in_cluster_indices.size();
165  centroid_.y /= in_cluster_indices.size();
166  centroid_.z /= in_cluster_indices.size();
167 
168  average_x /= in_cluster_indices.size();
169  average_y /= in_cluster_indices.size();
170  average_z /= in_cluster_indices.size();
171  }
172  average_point_.x = average_x;
173  average_point_.y = average_y;
174  average_point_.z = average_z;
175 
176  // length, width, height
177  length_ = max_point_.x - min_point_.x;
178  width_ = max_point_.y - min_point_.y;
179  height_ = max_point_.z - min_point_.z;
180 
181  // calculate convex hull polygon
182  polygon_.header = in_ros_header;
183  pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr hull_cloud (new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>);
184  pcl::ConvexHull<PointType> chull;
185  chull.setInputCloud(current_cluster);
186  chull.reconstruct(*hull_cloud);
187 
188  for (size_t i=1; i<hull_cloud->points.size(); i++)
189  {
190  geometry_msgs::Point32 p;
191  p.x = hull_cloud->points[i].x;
192  p.y = hull_cloud->points[i].y;
193  p.z = min_point_.z;
194  polygon_.polygon.points.push_back(p);
195  }
196 
197  current_cluster->width = current_cluster->points.size();
198  current_cluster->height = 1;
199  current_cluster->is_dense = true;
200 
201  valid_cluster_ = true;
202  pointcloud_ = current_cluster;
203 
204 }
205 
206 void Cluster::ToROSMessage(std_msgs::Header in_ros_header,
207  auvlab_msgs::CloudCluster &out_cluster_message)
208 {
209  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 cloud_msg;
210 
211  pcl::toROSMsg(*(this->GetCloud()), cloud_msg);
212  cloud_msg.header = in_ros_header;
213 
214  out_cluster_message.cloud = cloud_msg;
215  out_cluster_message.min_point.header = in_ros_header;
216  out_cluster_message.min_point.point.x = this->GetMinPoint().x;
217  out_cluster_message.min_point.point.y = this->GetMinPoint().y;
218  out_cluster_message.min_point.point.z = this->GetMinPoint().z;
219 
220  out_cluster_message.max_point.header = in_ros_header;
221  out_cluster_message.max_point.point.x = this->GetMaxPoint().x;
222  out_cluster_message.max_point.point.y = this->GetMaxPoint().y;
223  out_cluster_message.max_point.point.z = this->GetMaxPoint().z;
224 
225  out_cluster_message.avg_point.header = in_ros_header;
226  out_cluster_message.avg_point.point.x = this->GetAveragePoint().x;
227  out_cluster_message.avg_point.point.y = this->GetAveragePoint().y;
228  out_cluster_message.avg_point.point.z = this->GetAveragePoint().z;
229 
230  out_cluster_message.centroid_point.header = in_ros_header;
231  out_cluster_message.centroid_point.point.x = this->GetCentroidPoint().x;
232  out_cluster_message.centroid_point.point.y = this->GetCentroidPoint().y;
233  out_cluster_message.centroid_point.point.z = this->GetCentroidPoint().z;
234 
235  out_cluster_message.convex_hull.header = in_ros_header;
236  out_cluster_message.convex_hull = this->GetPolygon();
237 
238  out_cluster_message.nmea_msg.header = in_ros_header;
239  out_cluster_message.nmea_msg.sentence = this->GetNMEA();
240 
241  out_cluster_message.last_seen = this->GetLastSeen();
242 
243  out_cluster_message.id = this->GetID();
244 }
